texts.name: Han You
texts.biography: Han Yu is a professional contract killer. If you want to do business with him, make sure you have enough money.

specialty.description:
{Sword Keepers and Sword Riders}

Increases Speed of any Sword Keepers or Sword Riders by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for 3 levels (rounded up).
specialty.name: Sword Keepers
